001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config;
002
003import org.aeonbits.owner.ConfigCache;
004
005/**
006 * Singleton holder for managing the {@link UiConfig} instance.
007 *
008 * <p>This class ensures a single shared instance of the UI configuration throughout the application.
009 * The configuration is lazily initialized using {@link ConfigCache} for efficient retrieval.
010 *
011 * <p>Benefits:
012 * <ul>
013 *     <li>Prevents multiple instantiations of the {@link UiConfig} interface.</li>
014 *     <li>Ensures consistent configuration values throughout the test execution.</li>
015 *     <li>Leverages OWNER library caching for improved performance.</li>
016 * </ul>
017 *
018 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
019 */
020public class UiConfigHolder {
021
022   private UiConfigHolder() {
023   }
024
025
026   /**
027    * Singleton instance of the UI configuration
028    */
029   private static UiConfig config;
030
031   /**
032    * Retrieves the global {@link UiConfig} instance.
033    *
034    * <p>If the configuration has not been initialized, it will be created using {@link ConfigCache}.
035    *
036    * @return The singleton instance of {@link UiConfig}.
037    */
038   public static UiConfig getUiConfig() {
039      if (config == null) {
040         config = ConfigCache.getOrCreate(UiConfig.class);
041      }
042      return config;
043   }
044
045}
